title: Short-Term Course for Developing Critical Thinking Skills in Mathematics Through Systematic Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational college-level mathematics concepts (linear algebra, calculus, etc.)
context.additional_context: Experimental design focusing on fostering critical thinking through mathematical problem-solving, utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply evidence-based reasoning in the process of solving math problems
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in tasks measured by a math-domain-specific CT scale
Learners can holistically apply domain-wide CT elements (analysis, evaluation, creation) through project deliverables

resources: First Principles of Instruction model template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
